attributes.action: Make all female sanitary products free
attributes.additional_details: Make all female sanitary products free as we did not choose to have a menstrual cycle
attributes.background: Make all female sanitary products free as we did not choose to have a menstrual cycle

rejection.details:
The prices charged for commercially available products, such as sanitary products, are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599377
